select fi.id, fi.user_id, fi.author_id, fi.create_date, ui.code as userCode, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages, ai.name as authorName, ai.images as authorImages from follow_info fi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = fi.user_id) left join author_info ai on (ai.id = fi.author_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{followInfo.userName},'%')
AND ai.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{followInfo.authorName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{ followInfo.userId }
order by fi.create_date desc
